ಪೊಕ್ಕುಳ ಸುೞಿ pokkuḷa sułi = ಪೊಕ್ಕಳು - 1 & 4; ಪೊಕ್ಕುಳ ಬಳ್ಳಿ pokkuḷa baḷḷi the umbellical cord of a faetus through which food is supplied from its mother; 2. the typical relation a mother has with her children; 3. the offspring as emotionally related to its mother; ಪೊಕ್ಕುಳ ಪುರಿ pokkuḷa puri = ಪೊಕ್ಕುಳ ಬಳ್ಳಿ; ಪೊಕ್ಕುಳ ಕುಡಿ pokkuḷa kuḍi = ಪೊಕ್ಕುಳ ಬಳ್ಳಿ; ಪೊಕ್ಕುಳ ಪೂ pokkuḷa pū (myth.) the flower that come out from the navel of Viṣṇu.
